title: Raiders of the Lost Ark
oscars_won_details: Special Achievement Award for Sound Effects Editing
description: In 1936, archaeologist and adventurer Indiana Jones is hired by the U.S. government to find the Ark of the Covenant before Adolf Hitler's Nazis can obtain its supernatural powers.

title: On Golden Pond
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Leading Role
Best Actress in a Leading Role
Best Writing, Screenplay Based on Material from Another Medium
description: An aging couple, their estranged daughter, and her new boyfriend's son spend a summer together at a lake house in New England.

title: Chariots of Fire
oscars_won_details: Best Writing, Screenplay Written Directly for the Screen
description: The story of two British track athletes, one a determined Jew and the other a devout Christian, who compete in the 1924 Olympics.

title: Reds
oscars_won_details: Best Actress in a Supporting Role
description: A radical American journalist becomes involved with the Russian Revolution and tries to bring its communist ideals to the United States.

title: Das Boot
description: The claustrophobic world of a WWII German U-boat; boredom, filth and sheer terror.

title: An American Werewolf in London
description: Two American college students on a walking tour of Britain are attacked by a werewolf that none of the locals will admit exists.

title: Escape from New York
description: In 1997, when the U.S. president crashes into Manhattan, now a giant maximum security prison, a convicted bank robber is sent in to rescue him.

title: Mad Max 2: The Road Warrior
description: In the post-apocalyptic Australian wasteland, a cynical drifter agrees to help a small, gasoline-rich community escape a horde of bandits.

title: Time Bandits
description: A young boy accidentally joins a band of time-traveling dwarves as they jump from era to era looking for treasure to steal.

title: Body Heat
description: In the midst of a searing Florida heat wave, a woman persuades her lover, a small-town lawyer, to murder her wealthy husband.

title: The Evil Dead
description: Five college students vacationing in an isolated cabin in a remote wooded area find an ancient book that releases a legion of demons and spirits.

title: Scanners
description: A scientist sends a man with extraordinary psychic powers to hunt others like him.

title: Stripes
description: Two friends who are dissatisfied with their jobs decide to join the army for a bit of fun.

title: For Your Eyes Only
description: James Bond is assigned to find a missing British vessel, equipped with a weapons encryption device and prevent it from falling into enemy hands.

title: Thief
description: A professional safe cracker's plan to settle down with his girlfriend is disrupted when he gets involved with a powerful crime boss.

title: Gallipoli
description: The story of two young Australian sprinters who are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign during World War I.

title: History of the World: Part I
description: A series of comedic vignettes that satirize events in world history.

title: The French Lieutenant's Woman
description: A film-within-a-film, in which the actors in a Victorian period drama have an affair that mirrors the story of their characters.

title: Excalibur
description: A retelling of the legend of King Arthur and the Knights of the Round Table.

title: Quest for Fire
description: In prehistoric times, a tribe of primitive humans must find a new source of fire after their old one is extinguished.

title: Absence of Malice
description: A prosecutor leaks a false story to a reporter, and a man's life is ruined.

title: Mephisto
description: A German actor and director sells his soul to the Nazi regime to advance his career.

title: The Cannonball Run
description: A group of eccentric characters participate in an illegal cross-country road race.

title: My Dinner with Andre
description: Two old friends have a long and philosophical conversation over dinner.

title: Pixote
description: The story of a young boy who escapes from a brutal Brazilian youth detention center and becomes a street criminal.

title: Arthur
oscars_won_details: Best Actor in a Supporting Role
description: A drunken millionaire is forced to choose between a wealthy bride and a poor waitress.

title: Ragtime
description: A tapestry of American life in the early 20th century, as seen through the lives of a wealthy family, a black musician, and a Jewish immigrant.

title: History of the World: Part I
description: A series of comedic vignettes that satirize events in world history.

title: The Postman Always Rings Twice
description: A drifter and the wife of a roadside diner owner have a passionate affair and plot to murder her husband.

title: Blow Out
description: A movie sound recordist accidentally records the evidence that proves that a car accident was actually murder and consequently finds himself in danger.

title: Absence of Malice
description: A prosecutor leaks a false story to a reporter, and a man's life is ruined.

title: Mommie Dearest
description: The story of Joan Crawford's abusive and traumatic upbringing of her adopted daughter, Christina.

title: The Howling
description: A television newswoman is sent to a remote mountain resort after a traumatic experience, but she soon discovers that the residents are werewolves.

title: Taps
description: A group of military cadets takes over their academy to prevent it from being shut down.

title: Gallipoli
description: The story of two young Australian sprinters who are sent to fight in the Gallipoli campaign during World War I.

title: Clash of the Titans
description: The myth of Perseus and his quest to battle Medusa and the Kraken to save the Princess Andromeda.

title: Dragonslayer
description: A young wizard's apprentice is sent to kill a dragon that has been terrorizing a kingdom.

title: Heavy Metal
description: A glowing green orb that is the personification of ultimate evil travels through space and time, spreading its influence in this animated anthology film.

title: Outland
description: A federal marshal stationed at a mining colony on the Jupiter moon of Io uncovers a drug-smuggling ring.

title: Man of Iron
description: A cynical journalist is sent to cover the 1980 Solidarity strikes in Poland and has a crisis of conscience.

title: Possession
description: A woman's increasingly bizarre behavior after she asks her husband for a divorce is revealed to be the result of a sinister and otherworldly secret.

title: Cannibal Ferox
description: An anthropologist travels to the Amazon rainforest to disprove the existence of cannibalism, but she and her companions soon find themselves at the mercy of a tribe of flesh-eating natives.

title: History of the World: Part I
description: A series of comedic vignettes that satirize events in world history.

title: The Prowler
description: A group of college students are stalked and murdered by an unknown assailant in a small New Jersey town.

title: My Bloody Valentine
description: A decades-old folk tale about a deranged murderer killing those who celebrate Valentine's Day turns out to be true to a group of partying teenagers.

title: The Great Muppet Caper
description: Kermit, Gonzo, and Fozzie are reporters who travel to Britain to interview a rich victim of jewel thieves and help her along with her secretary, Miss Piggy.

title: Clash of the Titans
description: The myth of Perseus and his quest to battle Medusa and the Kraken to save the Princess Andromeda.

title: Wolfen
description: A New York City detective investigates a series of brutal murders that may be the work of a pack of intelligent wolves.

title: Halloween II
description: While Sheriff Brackett and Dr. Loomis hunt for Michael Myers, a traumatized Laurie is rushed to Haddonfield Memorial Hospital, and the serial killer is not far behind her.

title: Pennies from Heaven
description: A musical fantasy in which a sheet music salesman and a schoolteacher find their lives intersecting in a series of dreamlike sequences.
